```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup}
library(picoinjector)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
```



Load csv file:

```{r}
fads <- read_tsv("data/fads/220916/pi30v4_0.txt", skip = 7, col_names = c("time", "blue", "green", "red", "width", "spacing"), show_col_types = FALSE, locale = locale(decimal_mark = ","))
fads
```



```{r}
ggplot(fads, aes(x = green, y = red)) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0) + 
  geom_bin2d(bins = 100) + 
  scale_fill_continuous(type = "viridis") + 
  theme_pretty()
```




```{r}
ggplot(fads, aes(x = green, y = red)) + 
  geom_hex(bins = 100) + 
  scale_fill_continuous(type = "viridis") + 
  theme_pretty()
```
